CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Pixel purist mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Play Dinothawr without filtering. Scaling is only done in whole steps.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable gamepad overlay
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Displays an overlay which resembles a gamepad. Useful for touch-only devices.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Demo mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Deletes the save file when starting game. Allows many people to test from a clean state.

ListPreference.android:summary: Use a shader effect. Only recommended for powerful devices.
